Privacy Policy for VocabRiver

Last updated: 2025-06-15

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns, please submit an issue on the GitHub repository.

Data Collection and Storage

  • VocabRiver does not collect your data
  • All your data is processed locally in your Chrome browser and stored in your Chrome browserâ€™s storage
  • We do not send any of your data to our servers, or any third parties

Your Control

  • You have full ownership over your data
  • You can clear all saved words in settings
  • You can delete individual words from flashcards
  • You can disable the extension anytime

Permissions We Need

  • Storage: To save your words and preferences in your Chrome browser
  • History: To find dictionary lookups in your browsing
  • Tabs: To show flashcards on new tab page (optional)

How VocabRiver Works

  • Creates flashcards from your dictionary lookups
  • Shows your vocabulary history
  • Remembers your settings

Open Source

  • VocabRiver is open source
  • Code available at: GitHub

Changes to This Policy

We will notify you of any changes through the Chrome Web Store listing.
